message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm looking to save as much as I can, and I'm not sure if this product is worth that much to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I think the product's value is worth more than $9000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $11000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the benefits you'll get from the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd like to meet you at $10000. I think that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

I understand that you're still hesitant, Bob, but I think the product's value is worth more than $10000. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $11500. This is the best price I can offer, considering the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not convinced that the product is worth that much to me. I'd like to try to meet you at $9500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be comfortable with the price.

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go down to $9500. I think the product's value is worth more than that. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $11000. This is the lowest price I can offer, considering the value it brings to your business.
I'm not willing to go up to $11000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9500 and $11000. How about $10250? I think that's a fair price for the product.

I understand that you're trying to find a middle ground, Bob, but I'm not willing to go up to $10250. I think the product's value is worth more than that. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $10750. This is the lowest price I can offer, considering the value it brings to your business.

I've made several concessions, and I'm starting to think that the product might not be worth the investment for me. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying from John for $15000.
